topic.title: Audio File Player Form Control
topic.shortdesc: The oxy_audio built-in form control is used for providing a mechanism to play audio clips.

body.p: The oxy_audio form control supports the following properties:

ul.li: Relative values are resolved relative to the CSS. If you have media resources relative to the XML document, you can specify their paths like this:oxy_audio(href, oxy_url(oxy_base-uri(), 'ex.mp3')), width, 400px, height, 300px)

body.note: To insert a sample of the oxy_audio form control in a CSS file, invoke the Content Completion Assistant by pressing and select the oxy_audio code template.
